name: id
description: unique identififer of estimate

name: name
description: name of the estimate, selected from list of standard names

name: abbreviation
description: abbreviation of estimate (selected from list of standard abbreviations)

name: units
description: units of the estimate

name: location
description: location for which the estimate has been made

name: start_date
description: start date of the time interval for which the estimate has been made

name: end_date
description: end date of the time interval for which the estimate has been made

name: value
description: estimate value

name: uncertainty_type
description: type of uncertainty used to compute lower and upper bounds

name: lower_bound
description: lower bound of the uncertainty interval for the estimate

name: upper_bound
description: upper bound of the uncertainty interval for the estimate

name: population
description: description of the population for which the estimate has been made

name: method_description
description: description of the method used to make the estimate

name: data_description
description: description of the data used to make the estimate

name: data_URL
description: URL to the data used to make the estimate

name: date_publication
description: date the estimate was published

name: type_publication
description: type of publiation in which the estimate was published (report, pre-print, peer-reviewed, Github, dashboard, etc.)

name: title_publication
description: title of the publication in which the estimate was published

name: authors
description: authors who pulbished the estimate

name: publication_URL
description: URL to the publication in which the estimate was published

name: entry_date
description: date the estimate was entered in the estimate sheet

name: entry_person
description: name of the person who entered the estimate in the estimate sheet

name: entry_email
description: email of the person who entered the estimate in the estimate sheet
